name: Danielle Jagneaux
text: This little pizza place is such an asset to our tiny town. We are so lucky to have a place to sit down and eat pizza and sandwiches. My kids love the small size pizzas and I love the sandwiches. I like that I can call when I'm on my way and ‚Ä¶More

name: Stephanie M. Bond
text: The food was very good but a bit pricey. We ordered a medium supreme pizza. It was really loaded. Extremely tastie. The cheesey garlic bread was cooked just right. Mouth watering good. This pizza joint is an excellent place to eat just be ‚Ä¶More

name: Jaimie Jaimmers
text: Went today for the first time with my family. We absolutely love this pizza place. It is the best pizza I've ever had. The employees and owner are very friendly, make your food and bring it right out. The place is very clean as well. My ‚Ä¶More

name: Christie Farquhar
text: I've lived in the Moss Bluff area for 6 years but have never eaten at Fox's Pizza until tonight. Their flavorful crust is what makes the difference. Honestly the best pizza I've had in a long time, and the prices are good too!

name: Wendy Landry
text: As always this place is amazing with friendly staff and quick service.  Cannot and will not get pizza from anywhere else.  Prices are excellent.

name: Phil Frazier
text: Awesome place for Italian food, good people, and a good atmosphere. Bring your appetite the portions are generous.

name: Amy D
text: Our school group ordered ahead and our food was coming out as we sat down. Twenty-five of us had hot yummy pizza and we're back on our way. Clean place and great people. Thank you .

text: Spoke to the owner directly about an issue I had with our order and regardless of the outcome, which was also a negative experience, the owner was extremely rude, ended the initial call with no resolution and then call me back to tell me how I was wrong and he was right! That‚Äôs terrible business!!

text: Only reason they get 4 stars is because the pizza is absolutely amazing. Customer service is mediocre at best.

text: We went to eat today, we got there at 1030, not knowing they didn't open until 11. The owner came out and invited us in and made our food. Great customer service and delicious food!

text: Great place to eat. Service was pretty good. A bunch of high schoolers which took them a little longer than normal but they cranked out a bunch of WAITR orders while we were there also.

Great sauce.  No indigestion after eating.

text: Visiting in town for the holidays and ate at Fox's for the first time--wow! The food was amazing, and the service was excellent. Will be back everytime that I visit. My new favorite pizza!

text: Great tasting pizza and the best pizza in the  Moss Bluff and Lake Charles areas. Friendly, courteous, and helpful staff. Prices are reasonable and fair.

name: Christopher Espenshade
text: I used to come here with my family at least once a week. Used to be very good and very family friendly. We moved out of state and we ended up back in Moss bluff a year later. Excited to come back and eat Fox's pizza, now it's a hit and miss. Some days they are good and some days we just want to walk out. It's not the same anymore.

text: Amazing! Love The Big Nasty sandwich. Pizza is also great. We have been multiple times and the food is always fresh and very good. Christian, family friendly atmosphere.
